Hello and thanks for checking out my site. My name is Shaun Fox and I’m a designer/student living in Austin, Texas, with my beautiful wife and daughter. I am currently completing a BFA in Communication Design at Texas State University. You have been directed to this website because I would really like to work for you this summer as an intern. Thank you for taking the time to check out my work and I hope that we'll be able to work together soon.

If you would like to get in touch with me, please Say Hello!
